snippet: President Nicolas Sarkozy, facing a tough re-election fight this year, declared on Tuesday night that there were "too many foreigners" in France and that he would move to limit their numbers.
abstract: President Nicolas Sarkozy, facing a tough re-election fight this year, declared on Tuesday night that there were "too many foreigners" in France and that he would move to limit their numbers.

headline.main: 'Too Many Foreigners' in France, Sarkozy Says
